content: bramblegloop materials hooks - 5mm unless otherwise specified 3 5mm 3mm & 2mm worsted weight yarn - main colors for head/body & front ears are green & brown i used a fuzzy yarn from amazon called squirrel yarn olive green - for back of ears vine nose & mouth smaller amounts of lime green eyebrow leaves brown tan pink dark & light yellow mushrooms acorn & sprouts larger safety eyes 24-30mm scissors stitch markers yarn needle & stuffing worked in the round unless otherwise noted i put my stitch marker into the last stitch of the round bramblegloop is my own creation i have double checked the pattern but typo s can slip by please feel free to message me with any questions
